Package yx48_zh16.client.clientMiniMVC.clientMiniModel

Class ClientMiniModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • yx48_zh16.client.clientMiniMVC.clientMiniModel.ClientMiniModel
  • public class ClientMiniModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Definition of the mini model that holds a chat room.

                       IApplication applicationMe)
        Constructor of the mini model.
        Parameters:
        roomID - the ID of the chat room held.
        roomName - the name of the chat room held.
        userName - the user holding the chat room.
        currentMembers - the collection of members in the chat room.
        miniModelUpdateAdapter - adapter for the model to update its information.
        applicationMe - application me
